website_summaries.verdict: Classic leather riding boot in a wide calf.
pros: Well-made boots that are comfortable to walk in with a good design
Wider fit is also perfect for wearing outside jeans
cons: Zipper does not go to the top, making it awkward to put on

customer_reviews.title: A great buy for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boots. First day I wore them was a rainy day and they kept all the water out. They are comfy to walk in as well. The whole reason I got these was because I needed something with a slightly wider calf since the boots I ordered from another seller were too tight on my calves. These are a perfect fit on my slightly larger calves and even give a little wiggle room. Also Im usually a 7.5 in women's US and ordered an 8 instead and its a perfect fit as well. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: isabellam

customer_reviews.title: True wide calf boot
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a true wide calf boot. I have a wide calf at 15.5 inches so a 16.5 inch calf width boot is perfect for tucking in leggings and jeans. These boots are true to size and are really a wide calf yet they look fantastic. The leather is a good quality and the style is classic yet up to date. These are not grandma boots! So glad to find a brand I can trust with a wide calf size. I got black, I'm probably going to get the brown ones too, b/c as a wide calf girl, once you find a boot that fits and looks great, you buy it in every color you can!
customer_reviews.author: J. Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love the look
customer_reviews.text: These boots are incredibly stylish without being over the top. I love the look. But these are on the border of being regular calf width, not wide... I had to have them stretched to fit. Basically, if you are a plus size, I recommend another wide boot.
customer_reviews.author: ashley l robinson

customer_reviews.title: These boots look so nice. Very good quality and came packaged great
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping!! These boots look so nice. Very good quality and came packaged great. I have 15 1/2 wide calves and they give me room for wearing jeans with them. The only complaint I have is I wish they were cushioned and had more arch support for the price. Without inserts, I feel like I'll get sore feet by the end of the day. Other than that, I love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. Fit as expected, look great. Fits wider calf ~ 16 inches. Can wear these all day and night. I own a lot of boots, and these rate right at the top of the list.
customer_reviews.author: tbug

customer_reviews.title: Great boot! Minor issue with initial fit
customer_reviews.text: The boot fit, however, the first few times of wearing them, the inside panel that zips up bent into my ankles a bit which did cause some discomfort. I recommend wearing thick socks or hose to alleviate the pressure for the first few times of wearing the boots. It also helps to pull the boots as taunt and straight as possible while zipping the insides. This keeps them from scrunching down which helps them not to dig into the ankles. Even with this issue they are still great boots, especially if you can get them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Deloitte - SWilliams

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE!
customer_reviews.text: I love them! They look even better than their picture, and fit great! I have small ankles and big calves (thanks, dear Dad) and long boots are hard to come by that work for both. They seem very well made, and I expect them to last a long time. Great price too! They took no time to get here either - just two days. Altogether thrilled with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Liv'in Learn

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boots! Perfect fit and comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! At first they felt tight in the foot area and I considered sizing up but I'm glad I didn't. After wearing them twice, they stretched out and are perfect! Beautiful color. I have plenty of room around the calf area for jeans and leggings with extra space to spare. Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley M.

customer_reviews.title: Tight & Pinching Boots
customer_reviews.text: Returned the boots next day because shoe size was not true to size. Boots width is not size B, they were very tight and restrictive around the toe. Even if the sock on your foot is thin or non- existing.
customer_reviews.author: Robin Babakhani

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good boots
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good boots, very comfortable. Good quality for the money. If you are short this might not be the best boot for you. I am 5' 3" and if the boot came up any higher on my leg it would be to high.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Wide calf is a joke.
customer_reviews.text: These are advertised as wide calf, and the calf area is indeed wide. However it tapers back in above the calf and the zipper only goes from ankle to midcalf, which means I literally could not even pull these on far enough to see if the foot part fit. They will be returned.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I returned them. The leather is very thin across the feet and they wouldn't wear as nicely as my other boots. The tops are also not stretchy.
customer_reviews.author: DoxieLover

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful - worth every penny ;)
customer_reviews.text: Leather is beautiful. My calf is 15.5 inches and they fit really well with skinny jeans tucked in. Usually wear a 9 but ordered one size up as I usually do with boots. Especially like the high-low top of boot and the half zipper. No goring or elastic to mess up the look. Hopefully will last many years. Might order in brown.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Stylish true wide calf boots
customer_reviews.text: These are truly wide calf tall boots. Nice taylored styling- very stylish with quilted back texture. I'm a muscular 5'9" women and these boots hit just below the knee with room for skinny jeans. Good structure, won't sag down or out with extra space. Win!!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Urbanowicz

customer_reviews.title: THE Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I like these! I get a lot of compliments on them. They look great and they are comfortable. They do slouch down a bit which is a little annoying, but I do like them.
customer_reviews.author: jlynn17

customer_reviews.title: I love how tall these boots are
customer_reviews.text: I love how tall these boots are. The top/front comes to my knees...I'm 5'3. They fit my 15.5-16 inch calves with thicker, denim like leggings on. The leather is high quality and beautiful! Amazing boots!
customer_reviews.author: 2GodBtheGlory

customer_reviews.title: ... just too big for these boots -- they were great quality and looked great though
customer_reviews.text: My calves were just too big for these boots -- they were great quality and looked great though.
customer_reviews.author: Z.Y.

customer_reviews.title: After considerable debate with myself as I loved the look
customer_reviews.text: Lovely boot but not enough arch support. After considerable debate with myself as I loved the look, I returned these boots.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These boots said they were wide calf, but they are not. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Way too small. This boot is to even close ...
customer_reviews.text: Way too small. This boot is to even close to extra wide. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for girls with big calves!
customer_reviews.text: I get compliments on them all the time!! I have a horrible time finding boots because of my calves, and these fit even with jeans!! Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: I love the boots
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots, they are very comfortable, the only problem I have is they kinda pinch above my ankles on the inside.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... of the calf was bigger than i would have liked but overall a nice fit
customer_reviews.text: top part of the calf was bigger than i would have liked but overall a nice fit. I don't normally buy shoes online.
customer_reviews.author: Candy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. I have the hardest finding boots that are comfortable and fit my calves, these are amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lipinski

customer_reviews.title: These boots stated that they fit up to a 17" ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots stated that they fit up to a 17" calve but mine being 16.25" did not fit. Cute boots to small had to send back
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good boots and...
customer_reviews.text: I like the boot and I have to treat them like high heels you wear for an evening. These particular boots bruise my interior ankles. Unexpected but it is the look I wanted. I would rate them 4 hour boots.
customer_reviews.author: Jaguar

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. My calves are on the wider side but these boots are slim looking and I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Teacher Mom

customer_reviews.title: they look terrific on and they fit my calves
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pair of wide calf boots for some time, the price was right, they look terrific on and they fit my calves.
customer_reviews.author: sheryl brockett

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these boots! I get so many compliments on them! No one can believe they came from Amazon haha
customer_reviews.author: BB423

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. They required no break-in. I put them on and wore them all evening the first time I wore them. Plus - they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Chatty Kathy

customer_reviews.title: First Wide Calf Boot that is wide calf 👍🏽
customer_reviews.text: Love the boot and the fact that they are actually wide calf and I love them and the price is right.
customer_reviews.author: ctwv00

customer_reviews.title: Loved this boot
customer_reviews.text: Loved this boot, true to size . Didn't realize the zipper does go all the way to the top of the boot. It just zips by the ankle. I'm making it work. But it's hard if you jeans are thick to pull boot up with out scrunching up the denim.
customer_reviews.author: laurie massi

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and very cute, however, the shaft is still very snug for a boot that is "wide calf"
customer_reviews.author: ShayG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love the boots but a little hard to get on, I have to use a shoe horn.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M.

customer_reviews.title: These boots are perfect. Fit is as expected
customer_reviews.text: These boots are perfect. Fit is as expected. Wide cafe is just right also. Definitely a dark brown. Also, very comfortable. Great product for a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For tall girls - yay. The curve of the ...
customer_reviews.text: For tall girls - yay. The curve of the boot back is in the correct spot! For reference, my inseam is 34"
customer_reviews.author: jenniepennie

customer_reviews.title: Great Value, Fits Well, Leather Not high quality.
customer_reviews.text: My only disappointment is with the quality of the leather, but considering the price, it isn't too bad. I needed just slightly wider shaft than normal and many wide shaft boots are made for much heavier women and my legs get lost in them. The width is pretty perfect. I ordered a half size up from normal and the foot area is a little roomy, but not more than I would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Penn

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. Fit perfect. I was looking for a boot that was tall and wide enough for my calf and they were both. Very nicely made also, gotten a lot of compliments!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They make them more comfortable for all day wear
customer_reviews.text: My personal preference is more arch support so I ordered a size which allowed inserts. They make them more comfortable for all day wear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable boot...a bit wider in the calf than I expected but still looks very nice with skinny jeans or leggings
customer_reviews.author: REO127

customer_reviews.title: I love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. I have struggled to find boots that fit well for wide calves and are comfortable enough to wear to work all day...these boots are perfect. I will be buying another pair soon in another color.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Hmieleski

customer_reviews.title: The boots are beautiful, however they are much too narrow
customer_reviews.text: The boots are beautiful, however they are much too narrow. The calf fit is nice for a wide calf but the actual foot bed is so narrow. Had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Gregg

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boot. Fits my large calf perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Awesome boot. Fits my large calf perfectly. Buttery soft leather. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I usually use size 10 however i ordered a 10 ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually use size 10 however i ordered a 10.5. I have big calves and i was able to fit in them. It fits me very adjusted to my legs however i was able to wear them well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The boots feel nice quality wise
customer_reviews.text: The boots feel nice quality wise. My calves measure at 17inch, so these were a bit tight when you squat, but if you're standing they're not that bad. My major complain is the heel on my left foot is really rubbing and hurts to walk, not sure what the deal is. I might have to order a size up.
customer_reviews.author: Anna23

customer_reviews.title: So so.
customer_reviews.text: The upper part of the boots are too large (I wanted some slim one). The ankle parts hurt me when walking or moving after an hour or so (not soft enough).
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: These look a little cheap - but kind of expected ...
customer_reviews.text: These look a little cheap - but kind of expected that for the price. The style is attractive but I am returning them as they look and feel non-Anne Klein-ish where quality is concerned.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Parker

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: The wide calf shaft is just right for a calf that measures 16", and lets you tuck in slacks. The leather is on the thin side but still looks durable. If you're a size 8 with regular shoes, go one full size up and consider getting arch support pads, that is, if a lack of arch support is an issue for you.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally awesome boots!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow!! I love the feel of the leather and the wide fit is fabulous, I now can wear all of my stylish leggings and I can also tuck my jeans as well. I love them👍🏽👍🏽👍🏽
customer_reviews.author: Packers3021

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love love love. These boots are very comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: B. Dunlap*

customer_reviews.title: Best Deal Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Love it! Couldn't be happier w/ this boot or what I paid for it!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: Indeed wide-calf
customer_reviews.text: The boots are wide-calf, but I read some review saying they are actually not too wide. So I ordered them. Turn out the calf still had too much room for me. And don't like the quilted back very much. Next time, I should stick to normal calf size and just leather. Returning them.
customer_reviews.author: luilui

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boots.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I like a lot. So do the guys.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Madeira

customer_reviews.title: and I liked them so much when i did put them on
customer_reviews.text: they are cute,and I liked them so much when i did put them on. The thing is that they keep stains even water, i hate because feels like you just came out of bathroom and splashed the water on your boots
customer_reviews.author: edmond

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Put them on... Haven't worn them yet. Leather feels very cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Berry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the design, and lather material. Have compliment on it.
customer_reviews.author: wplyly11

customer_reviews.title: The leather quality was good and the calf size was true to size
customer_reviews.text: My wife got these boots, tried them on and immediately sent them back. She said they were baggy at the ankles, had no support in the foot bed and no tread on the bottom. The leather quality was good and the calf size was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Fickenscher

product_meta.title: Anne Klein Women's Kahlan Wide Calf Leather Riding Boot
product_meta.description:
DRESS - TALL SHAFT RIDING BOOT

AK Anne Klein offers an impressive footwear collection offering unparalleled variety in an extensive range of sizes, colors, and styles that give each shoe a unique style and character. AK Anne Klein footwear provides fashion, quality, and comfort at an affordable price point that's perfect for every modern woman's lifestyle.
feature_bullets: Knee-length boot in polished leather with decorative stirrup at ankle featuring polished hardware
Anne Klein iFlex Technology allows for a flexible fit that can bend up to 90 degrees
